mapper.select: insert into treasurebox (title, content, m_id) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{m_id}) returning b_seq
mapper.insert: insert into tbpic (pic_url, pic_name, b_seq) values (#{pic_url}, #{pic_name}, #{b_seq})
mapper.select:
select b_seq, title, content, regdate, hit, m_id from treasurebox where is_deleted='N'
order by regdate desc
order by regdate asc
mapper.insert: insert into tbcomment (content, b_seq, m_id) values (#{content}, #{b_seq}, #{m_id})
mapper.select: select c_seq, content, regdate, b_seq, m_id from tbcomment where b_seq=#{seq} and is_deleted='N' order by regdate asc
